Package xxl.core.xml.operators

This package contains a lot of useful sources, sinks and operators for processing a sequence (Iterator) of XML documents.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
XMLDocumentMetaData Interface defining meta data for XML Documents.
 

Class Summary
DOMTreeContentHandler This class implements a SAX Handler to receive the messages created by parsing XML document first, all the nodes with the given name will be selected.
Operators Contains a lot of useful methods for processing a sequence (Iterator) of XML documents.
Sinks This class contains sinks for stream processing of XML documents.
Sources This class contains sources for stream processing of XML documents.
XMLObject This class implements XMLDocumentMetaData using a map for storing the meta data.
 

Package xxl.core.xml.operators Description

This package contains a lot of useful sources, sinks and operators for processing a sequence (Iterator) of XML documents. The documents have to be wrapped into an XMLObject. Each document can posess meta data.

If you want to be informed on new versions of XXL you can subscribe to our mailing-list.
Send an email to xxl-request@lists.uni-marburg.de without subject and the word \"subscribe\" in the message body.

Questions or Bugs? Send us an Email: request@xxl-library.de
